rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with wide doorways and ramps, following Vastu guidelines for positive energy flow.
Spacious living area with easy mobility access, featuring integrated seating arrangements suitable for wheelchair users. Vastu placement ensures sunlight and natural ventilation.
Open dining space adjacent to the kitchen, designed following Vastu principles with an east-facing window for positive energy.
Modern kitchen with wheelchair accessible counters and appliances arranged per ergonomic standards. Vastu alignment ensures balance of fire element.
Accessible bathroom featuring grab bars, roll-in shower, and wide doorways in compliance with local accessibility norms and Vastu guidelines for purity.
Master bedroom designed with ample space for wheelchair maneuverability. South-east corner as per Vastu for wealth and health, featuring built-in storage near the door.
Additional bedroom designed with accessible features, placed in a stable area following Vastu principles to promote calmness.
Cozy library space for quiet reading and study. Designed with low shelves and wheelchair accessibility, ideally placed in the northeast corner as per Vastu for knowledge and growth.

openings.description: Main entrance door with automatic sensor system and ramp access, oriented eastwards for positive energy.
